solution_line_template: Mr. Alonzo was able to sell {sold_to_maxwell} + {sold_to_wilson} = <<{sold_to_maxwell}+{sold_to_wilson}={total_sold_tomatoes}>>{total_sold_tomatoes} kg of tomatoes.
So, there are {total_harvested_tomatoes} - {total_sold_tomatoes} = <<{total_harvested_tomatoes}-{total_sold_tomatoes}={unsold_tomatoes}>>{unsold_tomatoes} kg unsold tomatoes.
